title: Countries with the lowest national debt 2019
yAxis: National debt in relation to GDP
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows National debt in relation to GDP for 20 number of Countrys.
The National debt in relation to GDP is highest at Country Kiribati and lowest at Country Hong Kong SAR.
The difference of National debt in relation to GDP between the highest and lowest Country is 22.62.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and National debt in relation to GDP in the y axis.
The maximum National debt in relation to GDP 22.62 is found at Country Kiribati and the minimum is found at Hong Kong SAR where Country is 0.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows National debt in relation to GDP for 20 number of Countrys.
The National debt in relation to GDP is highest at Country Kiribati and lowest at Country Hong Kong SAR.
The difference of National debt in relation to GDP between the highest and lowest Country is 22.62.
max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and National debt in relation to GDP in each Country on the y axis.
Country Kiribati has the highest National debt in relation to GDP and Hong Kong SAR has the lowest National debt in relation to GDP.
Second maximum National debt in relation to GDP is found at Country Tuvalu.
There is a difference of 22.62 between the maximum Country Kiribati and minimum Country Hong Kong SAR.
The Country Kiribati has the highest National debt in relation to GDP, followed by Tuvalu, and Luxembourg. Down to the Country Hong Kong SAR which is the lowest.
Country Hong Kong SAR, and Macao SAR share the same value 0.0.
The Country Kiribati has 1.57 times more National debt in relation to GDP than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 287.67.
